items.sentence: Tom told me he usually eats breakfast at seven.
Tom told me that Mary was the one who did that.
Mary grabbed her purse and headed for the door.
Mary has known Tom since she was a little girl.
Mary has no idea how much Tom wants to see her.
Mary hopes Tom will sit next to her on the bus.
Tom always sleeps cuddled up to his Teddy Bear.
Tom told Mary that he could meet her on Monday.
We have some things that we need to talk about.
Tom explained to Mary in detail how to do that.
I can\'t go back to being just one of the guys.
I can\'t go with you today, but I can tomorrow.
I can\'t help worrying about what Tom might do.
Do you really want me to go to Boston with you?
I heard that Tom and Mary have both been fired.
Would you mind clearing up a few points for me?
I asked Tom for something he couldn\'t give me.
Tom and Mary could\'ve done that by themselves.
Tom is still working as a bartender, isn\'t he?
Everyone was sitting cross-legged on the floor.
